[
    FullOpeningTag(
        Span {
            line: 1,
            column: 1,
            position: 0,
        },
    ),
    Expression(
        ExpressionStatement {
            expression: StaticVariableMethodCall(
                StaticVariableMethodCallExpression {
                    target: Identifier(
                        SimpleIdentifier(
                            SimpleIdentifier {
                                span: Span {
                                    line: 1,
                                    column: 7,
                                    position: 6,
                                },
                                value: "Foo",
                            },
                        ),
                    ),
                    double_colon: Span {
                        line: 1,
                        column: 10,
                        position: 9,
                    },
                    method: VariableVariable(
                        VariableVariable {
                            span: Span {
                                line: 1,
                                column: 12,
                                position: 11,
                            },
                            variable: SimpleVariable(
                                SimpleVariable {
                                    span: Span {
                                        line: 1,
                                        column: 13,
                                        position: 12,
                                    },
                                    name: "$a",
                                },
                            ),
                        },
                    ),
                    arguments: ArgumentList {
                        comments: CommentGroup {
                            comments: [],
                        },
                        left_parenthesis: Span {
                            line: 1,
                            column: 15,
                            position: 14,
                        },
                        arguments: [],
                        right_parenthesis: Span {
                            line: 1,
                            column: 16,
                            position: 15,
                        },
                    },
                },
            ),
            ending: Semicolon(
                Span {
                    line: 1,
                    column: 17,
                    position: 16,
                },
            ),
        },
    ),
]
